articles.author: Paul McLeary, Jack Detsch
articles.title: Tech billionaires prepare to invade the Pentagon - POLITICO
articles.description: A handful of Silicon Valley executives could help transform the country’s largest bureaucracy — and benefit themselves while trying.
articles.content: A lot of us are hoping theres a revolution coming, Joe Lonsdale, founder of software company Palantir and startup investor said at a recent defense forum, where we hold the bureaucracy accountable, w… [+5214 chars]
